statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.5}+{8.49}\right)}={29.98}\approx{29.98}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.49}\cdot{5.98}={50.7702}\approx{50.8}.
